Personal_Force_Field.display_help: The Force Field is virtually impenetrable to all attacks. Nova.display_help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long

Damage_Resistance.display_help: Anti-Matter is resistant to some forms of damage.

No_Regeneration.display_help: Anti-matter is unable to regenerate himself while attempting to control the reactors.

Terminal_Accessed.display_help: Anti-Matter is near enough to a terminal that it is unlocked.

Annihilation.display_help: Your interference with Antimatter's control of the reactor has caused a runaway meltdown condition. As the antimatter begins streaming freely from the reactor, it reacts with matter and unleashes a deadly blast of energy that eradicates everything.

Grant_Heal.display_help: Antimatter has reached his destination and begins to heal.

Drawdown_Heal.display_help: Antimatter draws energy from the reactor and heals himself!

Revoke_Heal.display_help: Antimatter is no longer phased and has ceased healing.

Systemic_Decay.display_help: Anti-Matter's control over space and time grants him the ability to disassemble matter on a sub-atomic level. This effect radiates off his presence continuously, but can be negated simply by moving. The longer his targets remain stationary, the worse the damage to their body becomes.

Disintegration.display_help: Anti-Matter's control over space and time grants him the ability to disassemble matter on a sub-atomic level. He is currently attempting to disintegrate you. During this attack, you are frozen in place and damage will be dealt to you continuously, with each pulse harming you for a greater percentage of your health. If you die during the Disintegration, a portion of the matter is returned to Anti-Matter, healing him. If you survive the Disintegration, you will be drained of half of their maximum endurance. Note that Disintegration is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow

Atomic_Blast_Tell.display_help: Marauder slams the ground, activating a wave of Nova energy which devastates all enemies around him! Note that Atomic Blast is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow
Atomic_Blast_Tell.display_attacker_attack_floater: Atomic Blast! Back away from Anti-Matter!

Atomic_Blast.display_help: Anti-Matter has reduced your Defense and left you helpless with his Atomic Blast. Recharge: Long

Neutron_Bomb.display_help: Anti-Matter has reduced your Defense with his Neutron Bomb. Recharge: Moderate

Electron_Haze.display_help: Anti-Matter has reduced your Defense with his Electron Haze. Recharge: Moderate

Cosmic_Burst.display_help: Anti-Matter has Disoriented you and reduced your Defense with his Cosmic Burst. Note that Cosmic Burst is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Moderate

Radiation_Infection.display_help: You have been Infected with deadly radiation. Your Accuracy and Defense are reduced. Note that Radiation Infection is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Moderate

Enervating_Field.display_help: You have been exposed to an Enervating Field of radiation. Your damage and damage resistance are reduced. Note that Enervating Field is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Moderate
Enervating_Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the damage potential of all nearby foes.

Irradiate.display_help: You have been Irradiated and your Defense has been reduced. Note that Irradiate is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow

Lingering_Radiation.display_help: Your attack rate and movement speed has been slowed by the Lingering Radiation. Note that Lingering Radiation is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.
Power_Blast.display_target_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

Explosive_Blast.display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.
Explosive_Blast.display_target_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

Revive.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} yourself from the brink of death. You feel weak and cannot do anything for a while.

Sequestration_Field.display_help: If you are hit by Sequestration Field 3 times within a 30 second period, you and nearby allies will be imprisoned temporarily. Recharge 10 seconds.
Sequestration_Field.display_target_help: If you are hit by Sequestration Field 3 times within a 30 second period, you and nearby allies will be imprisoned temporarily. Recharge 10 seconds.

Stone_Fist.display_help: Shadowhunter's Stone Fists have Disoriented you.
Stone_Fist.display_target_help: Shadowhunter's Stone Fists have Disoriented you.

Tremor.display_help: A tremendous attack. Tremor shakes the very Earth itself, damaging and knocking back everything in a nearby area.
Tremor.display_target_help: A tremendous attack. Tremor shakes the very Earth itself, damaging and knocking back everything in a nearby area.

Seismic_Smash.display_help: Shadowhunter's Seismic Smash has knocked you out and left you helpless.
Seismic_Smash.display_target_help: Shadowhunter's Seismic Smash has knocked you out and left you helpless.

Rock_Armor.display_help: While this power is active, Shadowhunter's skin becomes Stone. Rock Armor make Shadowhunter highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal based attacks. They are less likely to land and affect Shadowhunter.
Rock_Armor.display_target_help: While this power is active, Shadowhunter's skin becomes Stone. Rock Armor make Shadowhunter highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal based attacks. They are less likely to land and affect Shadowhunter.

Hurl_Boulder.display_help: Shadowhunter can rip a Boulder out of the ground and Hurl it a short distance. The Hurled Boulder deals medium damage and can Knockback foes.
Hurl_Boulder.display_target_help: Shadowhunter can rip a Boulder out of the ground and Hurl it a short distance. The Hurled Boulder deals medium damage and can Knockback foes.

Stone_Prison.display_help: Shadowhunter's Stone Prison has Immobilized you. Your Defense is lowered and you cannot fly.
Stone_Prison.display_target_help: Shadowhunter's Stone Prison has Immobilized you. Your Defense is lowered and you cannot fly.

Earths_Embrace.display_help: The Outcast is so connected to mother earth, that he can draw upon its power to add to his own health. Activation this power grants the Outcast bonus Hit Points.
Earths_Embrace.display_target_help: The Outcast is so connected to mother earth, that he can draw upon its power to add to his own health. Activation this power grants the Outcast bonus Hit Points.

Claw_Swipe.display_help: Shadowhunter Wolves claw attacks cover a wide cone and can knockdown its foes.
Claw_Swipe.display_target_help: Shadowhunter Wolves claw attacks cover a wide cone and can knockdown its foes.

Hurl.display_help: You have been disoriented by the Werewolf's Hurl attack.
Hurl.display_target_help: You have been disoriented by the Werewolf's Hurl attack.

Wolf_Jumping.display_help: Shadowhunter Wolves can inherently jump real high and travel very fast.
Wolf_Jumping.display_target_help: Shadowhunter Wolves can inherently jump real high and travel very fast.

Resistance.display_help: Shadowhunter Wolves are highly resistant to all damage and Immobilization.
Resistance.display_target_help: Shadowhunter Wolves are highly resistant to all damage and Immobilization.
